summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; providing for the completion of plans, specifications and cost estimates, the acquisition of necessary right-of-way in Section 3, Township 23 North, Range 4 E., W.M. for and the construction of the Empire Way South Sanitary Sewer Interceptor and Pump Station Project and making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Municipal Sewerage 1971 Construction Fund therefor.
